Tag.x: Int64 // x top-left position of the Tag
Tag.y: Int64 // y top-left position of the Tag

TaggedImage.player: AgentID // player that has tagged this image

state.owner: AgentID // current owner of this smart contract
state.numberOfImages: Int64 // total number of images to tag
state.playsPerImage: Int16[] // counts how many times an image has been tagged
state.taggedImages: TaggedImage[] // a list with every TaggedImage (10 per imageId)

params.owner: AgentID? // optional owner of this smart contract

params.numberOfImages: Int64 // total number of images to tag
params.description: String // details on how should the images be tagged

assignImage.access: self // only SC itself can invoke this function

results.taggedImages: TaggedImage[] // a list with every TaggedImage (10 per imageId)
